item.title: Hegseth calls rare meeting of large number of generals and admirals
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has asked U.S. generals and admirals from around the world to gather next week for a rare meeting.

item.title: Murder suspect accidentally released from jail, sheriff calls it 'unacceptable'
item.description: A manhunt is now underway in Oregon for murder suspect who was mistakenly released from prison on Monday, according to the Multnomah County Sheriff's ...

item.title: 'Tragic irony': Dallas ICE shooter was targeting agents, not detainees

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Palestinian president calls Israeli aggression in Gaza Strip a 'war crime'
item.description: Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas called the Israeli aggression in the Gaza Strip a "genocide" and called for an end to the incursion.
